messages.content: Your response must be in HTML. The primary header for each chapter should be <h2>, then subsequent headers <h3>, <h4>, etc.
Do not include any commentary or extra text before or after the chapter content.
Before the initial H2 but before anything else, please insert this image link in an img tag with an src of {{9.data[].url}}
Do not include ```html or any code fencing.

mapper.content:
Hey,

Thank for requesting a free E-Book from us!
We've created it. It's attached below :)

Let us know your thoughts!

Best regards,
Fahad
mapper.subject: Your E-Book is ready to go:   {{2.answers.`11fcd71d`.textAnswers.answers[].value}}
